table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES, ENT_IDENTIFICATION, ENT_BANK_DETAILS,ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_IDENTIFICATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_BANK_DETAILS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_IDENTIFICATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_BANK_DETAILS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES, ENT_IDENTIFICATION, ENT_BANK_DETAILS,ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_IDENTIFICATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_BANK_DETAILS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_IDENTIFICATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_BANK_DETAILS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_PAY_CARD_DETAILS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_OTHERS.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

table.name: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY, OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL, ENT_LOCATION, ENT_CONTACT_METHOD, OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS, ENT_NOTES

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID = ENT_LOCATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID = ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID = ENT_NOTES.ENT_ENTITY(+) AND (CONTAINS(ENT_LOCATION.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_CONTACT_METHOD.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(OPS_SUSPECT_JOURNEYS.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR CONTAINS(ENT_NOTES.CONTEXT_SEARCH,?) > 0 OR contains(OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.CONTEXT_SEARCH, ?) > 0 )

search.joinQuery: DDEC_CARGO_DECLARATION.id=DDOC_DOCUMENT.ID and DDOC_DOCUMENT.DTYPE = 'DECLARE' and (ENT_ENTITY.ID = DDEC_CARGO_DECLARATION.DECLARANT or ENT_ENTITY.ID = DDEC_CARGO_DECLARATION.PRINCIPAL) and REF_DOC_STATUS.CODE = DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS

dynamicQueryInjection.where: (DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS = 'APA' or DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS = 'AAM' or DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS = 'ARE' or DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS ='SUB' or DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS ='RELRO')

search.joinQuery: a.ENT_ENTITY = b.ENT_ENTITY and b.DTYPE != 'ENTACC' and c.CODE = b.ACC_STATUS and d.CODE = b.REVENUE_TYPE and b.REVENUE_TYPE != 'MISC' and b.REVENUE_TYPE != 'CUSTOMS' and b.REVENUE_TYPE != 'GUA' and b.ACC_STATUS = 'REG'

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP A COMMODITY IN CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS
USED FOR LOOKING UP A CUSTOMS LOCATION IN CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS THIS INCLUDES LOADING/UNLOADING PLACE
USED FOR LOOKING UP A TRANSACTION TYPE IN CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS

search.joinQuery: OPS_RISK_PROFILES.ANALYST = REF_ANALYST.CODE(+) and OPS_RISK_PROFILES.TEAM = REF_TEAM.CODE(+) and OPS_RISK_PROFILES.USER_GROUP_ALLOCATION = REF_USER_GROUPS.CODE and OPS_RISK_PROFILES.ID = OPS_PROFILE_DISTRIBUTION.PROFILE_ID and OPS_PROFILE_DISTRIBUTION.OFFICE = REF_OFFICE.CODE

dynamicQueryInjection.where: OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.LINE_OF_BUSINESS = REF_BUSINESS_SECTOR1.CODE(+) AND REF_BUSINESS_SECTOR2.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_ORGANISATION.LINE_OF_BUSINESS_2

OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND REF_COUNTRY1.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.NATIONALITY AND REF_COUNTRY2.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_INDIVIDUAL.OTHER_NATIONALITY AND ENT_IDENTIFICATION.ENT_ENTITY(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND ENT_IDENTIFICATION.IDENTIFICATION_TYPE(+) = 'PASS'

OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.ID AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.REGISTRATION_COUNTRY AND REF_AIRCRAFT_TYPE.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_AIRCRAFT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE

OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND REF_MEASUREMENT.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.MEASUREMENTS AND REF_CONTAINER_TYPE.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.CONTAINER_TYPE AND REF_SHIPPING_LINE.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_CONTAINER.SHIPPING_LINE

OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.ID AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.REGISTRATION_COUNTRY AND REF_VEH_TYPE.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_VEHICLE.VEHICLE_TYPE
OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS_VIEW.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS_VIEW.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_GOODS_VIEW.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN

OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_ENTITY.ID AND OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.ID = OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.ID AND REF_VESSEL_TYPE.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.VESSEL_TYPE AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_TRANSPORT.REGISTRATION_COUNTRY AND REF_COUNTRY_FLAG.CODE(+) = OPS_SUSPECT_VESSEL.FLAG

search.note: THIS SEARCH IS USED FOR SEARCHING FOR Inspections
search.joinQuery: decl.id = insp.ddoc_document_id and doc.DOC_STATUS ='AIN' and doc.ID = insp.DDOC_DOCUMENT_ID

dynamicQueryInjection.where: EX_EXEMPTION.EXEMPTION_TYPE = 'EX_TAXPAYER' and EX_EXEMPTION.ID=EX_TAXPAYER.ID and EX_TAXPAYER.TAXPAYER = ENT_ENTITY.ID and EX_TAXPAYER.TAXPAYER = REV_ACC.ENT_ENTITY and REV_ACC.REVENUE_TYPE = 'TAXPAYER'

table.name: CASE_DETAILS LEFT OUTER join ent_entity on CASE_DETAILS.ENTITY_ID=ent_entity.ID LEFT OUTER join REV_ACC on ent_entity.ID=REV_ACC.ENT_ENTITY LEFT OUTER join case_assignment on CASE_DETAILS.ID = case_assignment.case_id LEFT OUTER join wfis_user_t on case_assignment.case_officer = wfis_user_t.description
ref_doc_type dtype, REV_ACC tin JOIN REV_ACC ent ON tin.ENT_ENTITY = ent.ENT_ENTITY and tin.REVENUE_TYPE = 'TAXPAYER' JOIN DDOC_DOCUMENT doc ON doc.REV_ACC = ent.ID

dynamicQueryInjection.where: DDEC_CARGO_DECLARATION.id=DDOC_DOCUMENT.ID and DDOC_DOCUMENT.DTYPE = 'DECLARE' and ENT_ENTITY.ID = DDEC_CARGO_DECLARATION.DECLARANT and REF_DOC_STATUS.CODE = DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS and DDOC_DOCUMENT.ID = DEC_TAX.DDOC_DOCUMENT (+)

search.joinQuery: OPS_GOODS_SEIZED.SEIZURE_ID(+) = OPS_SEIZURE.ID AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = OPS_GOODS_SEIZED.COUNTRY_WHENCE_CONSIGNED AND REF_SEIZURE_REASONS.CODE(+) = OPS_SEIZURE.SEIZURE_REASON AND REF_PRODUCTS.ID = OPS_GOODS_SEIZED.PRODUCT_ID

CUS_FREIGHT_VALUATION.ID = CUS_VALUATION.ID (+) AND export.CODE(+) = CUS_VALUATION.COUNTRY_OF_EXPORT AND arrival.CODE(+) = CUS_FREIGHT_VALUATION.COUNTRY_OF_ARRIVAL AND arr.id (+) = CUS_FREIGHT_VALUATION.point_of_arrival AND embark.id (+) = CUS_FREIGHT_VALUATION.PLACE_OF_EMBARKATION AND transport.code (+) = cus_valuation.transport_type AND carrier.code (+) = CUS_FREIGHT_VALUATION.CARRIER_NAME

table.name: CUS_VALUATION cv left outer join REF_MEASUREMENT rm on cv.UNIT_MEASURE = rm.code, CUS_PRODUCT_VALUATION cpv left outer join ENT_ENTITY im on cpv.EXPORTER = im.ID left outer join ENT_ENTITY ex on cpv.IMPORTER = ex.ID left outer join REF_COUNTRY rc on cpv.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN = rc.code

search.joinQuery: rp.ID = cpv.PRODUCT_ID AND cpv.ID = cv.ID AND rcc.CODE = rp.COMMODITY_CODE

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP A PRODUCT
USED FOR LOOKING UP A LOCATION
USED FOR LOOKING UP A CARRIER
USED FOR LOOKING UP A LOCATION

table.name: DMAN_JOURNEY_SEGMENT DJS left outer join REF_LOCATION_BY_COUNTRY RLC on DJS.ARRIVAL_PLACE = RLC.ID left outer join REF_LOCATION_BY_COUNTRY RLC2 on DJS.DEPARTURE_PLACE = RLC2.ID left outer join REF_COUNTRY RC on DJS.ARRIVAL_COUNTRY = RC.CODE left outer join REF_COUNTRY RC2 on DJS.DEPARTURE_COUNTRY = RC2.CODE, DMAN_JOURNEY DJ left outer join REF_CUST_TRAN_MODE RTM on DJ.TRANSPORT_MODE = RTM.CODE

dynamicQueryInjection.where: ENT_ENTITY.ID = ENT_TRANSPORT.ID AND ENT_TRANSPORT.ID = ENT_AIRCRAFT.ID AND REF_AIRCRAFT_TYPE.CODE(+) = ENT_AIRCRAFT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE AND REF_AIRLINE.CODE(+) = ENT_AIRCRAFT.AIRLINE
ENT_ENTITY.ID = ENT_TRANSPORT.ID AND ENT_TRANSPORT.ID = ENT_VEHICLE.ID AND REF_VEH_TYPE.CODE(+) = ENT_VEHICLE.VEHICLE_TYPE

ENT_ENTITY.ID = ENT_TRANSPORT.ID AND ENT_TRANSPORT.ID = ENT_VESSEL.ID AND REF_VESSEL_TYPE.CODE(+) = ENT_VESSEL.VESSEL_TYPE AND REF_COUNTRY.CODE(+) = ENT_VESSEL.FLAG AND REF_PORT.CODE(+) = ENT_VESSEL.PORT_OF_REGISTRATION

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP A PACKAGE TYPE IN CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS
USED FOR SELECTING AN ORGANISATION

table.name: ENT_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN ENT_ENTITY ON ENT_ENTITY.id=ENT_ORGANIZATION.id LEFT OUTER JOIN ENT_SITE ON ENT_ENTITY.id=ENT_SITE.ent_entity LEFT OUTER JOIN ENT_LOCATION ON ENT_SITE.ent_location=ENT_LOCATION.id

search.note: USED FOR SELECTING AN CONTAINER

table.name: ENT_CONTAINER ENTCON LEFT OUTER JOIN REF_CONTAINER_STATUS RCS on ENTCON.CONTAINER_STATUS = RCS.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN REF_CONTAINER_TYPE RCT on ENTCON.CONTAINER_TYPE = RCT.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN REF_CONT_MEASUREMENTS RCM on ENTCON.MEASUREMENTS = RCM.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ENT_ORGANIZATION EO on ENTCON.SHIPPING_LINE = EO.ID

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP A FREE ZONE LOCATION IN CUSTOMS DECLARATIONS.THIS SEARCH BRINGS THE FREE ZONE RESULTS WITH VALID PERIOD.

table.name: FZ_FREE_ZONE fz left outer join REF_OFFICE ro on fz.SUPERVISING_OFFICE = ro.CODE left outer join REF_FREEZONE_CONTROL_TYPE rfc on fz.FREE_ZONE_CONTROL_TYPE = rfc.CODE left outer join REF_UNLOCODE_CODELIST_ALL rcl on fz.LOCATION_CODE = rcl.ID

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP OFFICES.

table.name: REF_OFFICE left outer join REF_COUNTRY on REF_OFFICE.COUNTRY = REF_COUNTRY.CODE

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP PRINTERS.
USED FOR LOOKING UP WAREHOUSES.

table.name: WH_WAREHOUSE left outer join REF_WAREHOUSE_TYPE on WH_WAREHOUSE.WAREHOUSE_TYPE = REF_WAREHOUSE_TYPE.CODE

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING FOR A CONTAINER MEASUREMENT THAT WILL BE USED IN THE CONTAINER DETAILS PAGE.
USED FOR LOOKING FOR A CONTAINER TYPE THAT WILL BE USED IN THE CONTAINER DETAILS PAGE.

table.name: APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: P_AND_I_CONFIGURATION.MODULE = REF_MODULES.CODE(+) AND P_AND_I_CONFIGURATION.COMPUTATION_TYPE = REF_COMPUTATION_TYPE.CODE(+) AND P_AND_I_CONFIGURATION.COMPUTATION_METHOD = REF_COMPUTATION_METHOD.CODE(+)

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING FOR USERS

table.name: (SELECT wut.name, wut.firstname, wut.lastname, wut.access_level, wut.title, wut.displayname, CASE WHEN ros.status='A' THEN ros.ref_office END ref_office, ros.status, ros.expiry_date, row_number() over (partition BY wut.name order by ros.status, ros.expiry_date nulls FIRST) ro FROM wfis_user_t wut LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_off_staff ros ON wut.name=ros.user_name )

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP REPORT DOCUMENTS.

table.name: REF_DOC_REPORT left outer join REF_DOC_TYPE on REF_DOC_REPORT.DOC_TYPE = REF_DOC_TYPE.CODE
DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT DOC, APP_APPLICATION APP, REF_DOC_STATUS STATUS, APP_CONFIGURATION APPCONF left outer join REF_APPLICATION_TYPE REFAPPTYPE on APPCONF.APPLICATION_TYPE = REFAPPTYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: APP.APP_CONFIGURATION_ID=APPCONF.ID AND DOC.ID = APP.ID AND STATUS.CODE = DOC.DOC_STATUS

ENT_ENTITY.id = REV_ACC.ENT_ENTITY and REV_ACC.ID = DDOC_DOCUMENT.REV_ACC and DGUA_GUARANTEE.ID= DDOC_DOCUMENT.ID and DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_COUNTRY= REF_COUNTRY.CODE (+) and DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_TYPE= REF_GUARANTEE_TYPE.CODE and DGUA_GUARANTEE.ID = SYS_TASK_LINK.OBJECT_ID and SYS_TASK_LINK.ENTITY_ID = ENT_ENTITY.id and DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS = 'NEW' and SYS_TASK_LINK.OBJECT_TYPE = 'GUARANTEE'

DGUA_GUARANTEE_USAGE.HEADER_ID = DGUA_GUARANTEE_USAGE_HEADER.ID AND DGUA_GUARANTEE_USAGE_HEADER.ACCOUNT_TYPE = REF_GUARANTEE_USAGE_TYPE.CODE AND ENT_ENTITY.ID(+) = DGUA_GUARANTEE_USAGE_HEADER.ACCOUNT_HOLDER_ID

ENT_ENTITY.id = REV_ACC.ENT_ENTITY and REV_ACC.ID = DDOC_DOCUMENT.REV_ACC and DGUA_GUARANTEE.ID= DDOC_DOCUMENT.ID and DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_COUNTRY= REF_COUNTRY.CODE (+) and DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_TYPE= REF_GUARANTEE_TYPE.CODE

dynamicQueryInjection.where: DGUA_GUARANTEE.ID = SYS_TASK_LINK.OBJECT_ID and SYS_TASK_LINK.ENTITY_ID = ENT_ENTITY.id and DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS = 'NEW' and SYS_TASK_LINK.OBJECT_TYPE = 'GUARANTEE'

DGUA_GUARANTEE.USAGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'DECL' AND TRUNC(DGUA_GUARANTEE.PERIOD_TO) > TRUNC(sysdate) AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'NEW' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'USED' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'CAN' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'AMENDED' AND ((DGUA_GUARANTEE.INDIVIDUAL_USE_INDICATOR = 'T' AND DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_BALANCE = DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_VALUE) OR DGUA_GUARANTEE.MULTIPLE_USE_INDICATOR = 'T')

DGUA_GUARANTEE.USAGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'TAX' AND TRUNC(DGUA_GUARANTEE.PERIOD_TO) > TRUNC(sysdate) AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'NEW' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'USED' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'CAN' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'AMENDED' AND ((DGUA_GUARANTEE.INDIVIDUAL_USE_INDICATOR = 'T' AND DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_BALANCE = DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_VALUE) OR DGUA_GUARANTEE.MULTIPLE_USE_INDICATOR = 'T')

DGUA_GUARANTEE.USAGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'WHAPP' AND TRUNC(DGUA_GUARANTEE.PERIOD_TO) > TRUNC(sysdate) AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'NEW' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'USED' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'CAN' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'AMENDED' AND ((DGUA_GUARANTEE.INDIVIDUAL_USE_INDICATOR = 'T' AND DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_BALANCE = DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_VALUE) OR DGUA_GUARANTEE.MULTIPLE_USE_INDICATOR = 'T')

DGUA_GUARANTEE.USAGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'REVDEF' AND TRUNC(DGUA_GUARANTEE.PERIOD_TO) > TRUNC(sysdate) AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'NEW' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'USED' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'CAN' AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_STATUS != 'AMENDED' AND ((DGUA_GUARANTEE.INDIVIDUAL_USE_INDICATOR = 'T' AND DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_BALANCE = DGUA_GUARANTEE.GUARANTEE_VALUE) OR DGUA_GUARANTEE.MULTIPLE_USE_INDICATOR = 'T')

table.name: REVENUE_DEFERMENT LEFT OUTER JOIN REV_ACC ON REV_ACC.ID = REVENUE_DEFERMENT.REVENUE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVLED_TRANSACTION ON REVLED_TRANSACTION.REV_ACC = REV_ACC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVLED_REV_PERIOD ON REVLED_TRANSACTION.REVLED_REV_PERIOD = REVLED_REV_PERIOD.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TAXPAYER_IDENTIFIER_VIEW ON REV_ACC.ENT_ENTITY = TAXPAYER_IDENTIFIER_VIEW.ENT_ENTITY LEFT OUTER JOIN ENT_ENTITY ON ENT_ENTITY.ID = TAXPAYER_IDENTIFIER_VIEW.ENT_ENTITY

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP DOCUMENT TYPES.

table.name: REF_DOC_TYPE left outer join REF_DOC_CATEGORY on REF_DOC_TYPE.DOC_CATEGORY = REF_DOC_CATEGORY.CODE

REV_COMPLIANCE_CONF left outer join REF_REV_TYPE on REV_COMPLIANCE_CONF.REVENUE_TYPE = REF_REV_TYPE.CODE left outer join REF_COMPLIANCE_TYPE on REV_COMPLIANCE_CONF.COMPLIANCE_TYPE = REF_COMPLIANCE_TYPE.CODE

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING DOCUMENT TYPES.
USED FOR LOOKING DOCUMENT JOBS.

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT left outer join REF_DOC_TYPE on DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_TYPE = REF_DOC_TYPE.CODE

search.joinQuery: REF_DOC_TYPE.REPORT_CODE is not NULL AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.PRINT_STATUS IS NULL

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING DOCUMENT JOBS FOR REPRINT.

table.name: DDOC_DOCUMENT left outer join REF_DOC_TYPE on DDOC_DOCUMENT.DOC_TYPE = REF_DOC_TYPE.CODE and REF_DOC_TYPE.REPORT_CODE != NULL AND DDOC_DOCUMENT.PRINT_STATUS = 'PRINTED'

search.joinQuery: a.ENT_ENTITY = b.ENT_ENTITY AND e.id = b.ent_entity AND b.DTYPE != 'ENTACC' AND c.CODE = b.ACC_STATUS AND d.CODE = b.REVENUE_TYPE AND b.REVENUE_TYPE != 'MISC' AND b.REVENUE_TYPE != 'CUSTOMS' AND b.ACC_STATUS = 'REG'

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP OFFICES.
search.joinQuery: (REF_OFFICE.expiry_date is null or REF_OFFICE.EXPIRY_DATE >= SYSDATE) and REF_OFFICE.COUNTRY = (SELECT SYS_PARAMETERS.VALUE FROM SYS_PARAMETERS WHERE SYS_PARAMETERS.CODE = 'BASE_COUNTRY')

search.note: USED FOR LOOKING UP GOODS TRANSFER METHODS.
USED FOR LOOKING UP HANDLING OPERATION.
USED FOR LOOKING UP CUSTOMS REGIME.

table.name: LOG_ACTIVITY_LOG log left outer join REF_TRIPS_MODULE_NAME rm on log.MODULE_NAME = rm.code
